artist: Artist: Utagawa Kuniyoshi; Publisher: Iseya Rihei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: standing female figure wearing a kimono with pink at the top fading into blue at the hem, with white flowers at bottom and yellow and white trim, with blue obi; woman looks down at a steaming blue and white cup on a red lacquer table in LRC; grey cloud of steam twining around figure
inscription: (Died April 8, Tenpō 7, age of 39, burried at Jōsenji temple, Fukagawa); Farewell poem
markings: censor seal: kiwame; publisher\'s seal: Iseya
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portrait of Iwai Hanshirō VI
